fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Trade, Energy and Climate, Education, Transport, EU Single Market, Environment, Digital Single Market, Industrial policy, Labour relations.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The main goals of LPK are to create the most favourable conditions for economic, technical and social progress of Lithuanian enterprises, to present the rights of members and defend their interests in the governmental, social and international structures, improve export and import conditions in order to enable Lithuanian industry to contribute properly to the strengthening of economy.
